description:
Changed up the front end of this video without a preview of things to come.
Santana was not keen on pushing his limits, but we still did a few things to get him in the guy-guy-zone.
I of course aired this out of order, as he just had a video with Sebastian doing significantly more. So I hope you won't be disappointed.
But it's always fun to tie up a blue-eyed Puerto Rican dude and making him cum!
title: Bryan & Santana - Edge
